snippet: A man who was fired by a private school in Jacksonville on Tuesday returned to campus with a gun hidden in a guitar case and shot the headmistress to death before committing suicide.
abstract: Shane Schumerth, who was fired by a private school in Jacksonville, Fla, returns to campus with a gun hidden in a guitar case and shoots headmistress Dale Regan to death before committing suicide.
lead_paragraph: A man who was fired by a private school in Jacksonville on Tuesday returned to campus with a gun hidden in a guitar case and shot the headmistress to death before committing suicide.

headline.seo: Fired School Worker Kills Headmistress and Himself
headline.main: Florida: Fired School Worker Kills Headmistress and Himself
headline.print_headline: Florida: Fired School Worker Kills Headmistress and Himself
